title: Mango Milkshake | Cold Beverage | Summer ☀️ Treat
content:
Everyone's favorite fruit during summer is 'Mango' either it is raw or ripped Mango. Mangoes are juicy , sweet and most widely cultivated all over world but it plays vital role in India. It is the National fruit of India and we can make many varieties of mouthwatering dishes with raw mango and ripped Mango 😋 With raw mango, we can make Pickle, Dal, chutney, Mango rice what not any thing can transformed into delicious dish. With Ripped Mango, we can make Mango jelly, Mango ice cream, Mango Milkshake the list goes on.. Today, I'm sharing simple yet delicious and healthy Milkshake with ripped mango 😍 Cold Beverage: Mango Milkshake  Servings: 2 Duration: 5 minutes  Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Ripped Mango - chopped- 300 gms
  • Milk - cold - 400 ml
  • Cane sugar - 100 gms
  • Ice cubes - 3
Procedure:
  • Add all ingredients in juicer
  • Select Milkshake and blend till smooth puree
  • Pour in serving glasses & garnish with mango puree and chunks ( optional )
  • Milkshake ready to serve
  • Serve it anytime during summer ☀️
  • Happy Cooking 👩🏻‍🍳& enjoy your day
